In consideration of the payment of the premium, and

title: 2. Extensions of Cover:
sample_text:
2.8	
Civil Fines and Penalties
The Insurer will pay Civil Fines and Penalties 
imposed on an Employee that arise from a 
covered Claim or Professional Investigation 
made against such Employee, but only to the 
extent that such Civil Fines and Penalties are 
insurable under both the law applicable to this 
Policy and the jurisdiction in which such Civil 
Fines and Penalties are imposed.
The cover provided under this Extension shall 
be subject to both the applicable Sub-Limit of 
Liability and Retention specified in the Schedule.
2.9	
Defamation
